row.process:
@echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_MSSQL.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_LOGIN_LOGGING_PARAMS
!creates a database login with the given options :SET &UC4RB_SQL_DATABASENAME# = &UC4RB_DB_DATABASE_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_SQL_SID# = ""
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# = "GO" :SET &UC4RB_DB_USE_TNS# = "NO" :SET &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA# = ""
! escape &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# in order to allow special characters in password field :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_PWD# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = "USE master; GO "
:IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_FROM_WIN_SRC# = "YES" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_MSSQL.PRV.INCLUDE.WRAP_DB_NAME_IN_BRACKETS "UC4RB_DB_NAME" = "UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_NAME" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "create LOGIN &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_NAME# ") : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "FROM WINDOWS, ") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "create LOGIN &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_NAME# ") : IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_PWD_MUST_CHNG# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "WITH password = '@Password@' must_change, ") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#,"WITH password = '@Password@', ") : ENDIF
: INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_MSSQL.PRV.INCLUDE.WRAP_DB_NAME_IN_BRACKETS "UC4RB_DB_NAME" = "UC4RB_DB_DATABASE_NAME" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "default_database = &UC4RB_DB_DATABASE_NAME#, ")
: IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_CHK_EXPR# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "check_expiration = ON, ") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#,"check_expiration = OFF, ") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_CHK_POLICY# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, "check_policy = ON, ") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#,"check_policy = OFF, ") : ENDIF
:ENDIF
:SET &catlength# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#) :SET &catlength# = SUB(&catlength#, 2) :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, 1, &catlength#) :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " GO ") :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_MSSQL.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
! Add sqlpassword param :SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = "" :IF &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_PWD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -sqlpwd &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_PWD#") :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_MSSQL.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
del "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :IF &UC4RB_FAIL_IF_EXISTS# = "NO" : SET &ERRNR# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS( ,,"RETCODE") : IF &ERRNR# = 12 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*already exists.*") : PROCESS &HND# : SET &MESS# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &POS#=STR_FIND(&MESS#,": The server principal") : IF &POS# > 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : ENDIF :ENDIF
